news_header: Continental announces workforce cuts due to automotive industry downturn.
news_original_title: German auto parts giant to slash thousands of jobs
news_text: Continental, a German auto parts supplier, is reducing its workforce significantly, closing a plant and cutting 3,000 jobs in R&D by 2026 due to a downturn in the automotive industry. The company aims to remain competitive and will continue investing in R&D despite the cuts. Worker representatives express concern over the impact on the automotive division.
